cast.name: 路德·范德鲁斯 Luther Vandross
娜塔丽·艾珀顿 Natalie Appleton

introduction: This special concert, staged at New York's Hammerstein Ballroom, features a variety of major stars from pop, rock, country, and R&B paying tribute to his genius, with Bacharach on hand and leading the orchestra.It was such a success that it was released both on CD and VHS formats. The DVD was released in Brazil in Region 0. The VHS has the same cover as the CD and it is for Region 1. I think there is an european release of the DVD called Night to Remember, NTSC format by Immortal.Bacharach introduces each track in the DVD, he conducts all tracks and plays piano in most of them, and singing some.DVD Information:Encoding: Region 0, All RegionsFormat: Dolby Digital 2.0 StereoStudio: Top TapeDVD Release Date: December 3, 2002Run Time: 71 minTrack Listing:01 - One Less Bell To Answer - Sheryl Crow02 - Always Something There's To Remind Me - All Saints03 - This House is Empty Now / God Give Me Strength - Elvis Costello04 - Baby It's You / A Message To Michael - Chrissie Hynde05 - What's New Pussycat - Mike Myers06 - Anyone Who Had A Heart - Wynonna07 - Raindrops Keep Fallin' On My Head - Ben Folds Five08 - Close To You (They Long To Be) - Barenaked Ladies09 - Windows Of The World / What The World Needs Now Is Love - Luther Vandross10 - Wives And Lovers - David Sanborn/George Duke11 - Walk On By / Say A Little Prayer / Do You Know The Way To San Jose - Dionne Warwick12 - Alfie - Burt Bacharach
